general.gigTitle: design, redesign, clone, build, rebuild wordpress, wordpress website development

sellerCard.description: I am a professional WordPress developer with 6 years of experience. I've experienced WordPress, HTML, CSS, PHP, jQuery, and any issues regarding WordPress websites; I'll be your reliable tech support. I will design, build, secure, repair, and SEO empower your WordPress websites, so they look great, load lightning fast, and rank high in search engines. With professional ethics, I understand the importance of the work and producing modern and professional websites.

description.content:
Are you looking for an expert WordPress developer to design or redesign your WordPress website using elementor page builder?

 

If so, You have come to the right place!

 

I can help you to build a responsive, professional, SEO-optimized WordPress website for your business! I offer WordPress expertise, cost-effective solutions, and excellent customer services at an affordable cost.

 

Services I Offer:

 

ðŸ”° Design a Professional Website

ðŸ”° Redesign Existing Website for Better Looks

ðŸ”° eCommerce Functionality

ðŸ”° SEO-friendly and Responsive

ðŸ”° Slider, Svg Image, and Animation Effect.

ðŸ”° Speed Optimization & Fast Loading

ðŸ”° Setup Any Payment Gateway

ðŸ”° Popup, Optin Form, Complex Forms

ðŸ”° Site Transfer to Another Domain or Hosting

 

 

Why Choose Me?


ðŸ”° More Than 5 Years of Experience

ðŸ”° Quick and Professional

ðŸ”° Multiple Revisions

ðŸ”° Free Support for 30 Days

 

Be smart and make smart decisions! Why wait in a busy seller's order queue? Place an order today and enjoy premium services.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I have to provide while hiring you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You need to provide me hosting information/ WordPress login information, your logo, an outline of your website ( rough sketch or blueprint) and content for your website, including text, images, videos etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting and domains?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I do not. You will provide the domain and hosting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the website be responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, the website will be responsive and will exactly be fitted to all screen sizes, including all devices like cell phones, laptops, tablets, PCs and large screens.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my WordPress website easily?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: DON'T WORRY !!! Don't need to be a technical person. I'll Design in a way that you just need to drag and drop things to add or edit the content.

reviews.comment: One of the best sellers I have worked with. Designed my best website to this date. And worked on any changes consistently after job was done A+++++++

seller_response.comment: Youâ€™re the BEST. Loved working for you and look forward to working with you again one day! Wishing you all the success in the world.

reviews.comment: Shofiqul was easy to get a hold of whenever we needed him he responded in a timely manner. He went above and beyond whenever we needed help with anything. He is friendly, creative, polite, easy to work with and we would definitely recommend him to anyone who wants a great quality website! We will continue to use him for future projects!

seller_response.comment: Thanks for taking a close look at my work. I appreciate your cooperation.

reviews.comment: The final product fell short of my expectations with noticeable attention to details. While working together was average, there was a clear need for more effort and proactiveness, leaving me feeling the value received was quite low.
It took a year to get simple little details correct and my work is still yet to be completed but yet he closed the order.

I had the pleasure of working with Shofiqul on my website, and I couldnâ€™t be more satisfied with the experience. He was incredibly patient, attentive, and professional throughout the entire process. Every request I made was executed flawlessly, and he went above and beyond to ensure that the final result met my expectations.

His expertise and dedication truly set him apart. Whether it was design adjustments, functionality improvements, or technical tweaks, he handled everything with precision and efficiency. If youâ€™re looking for a reliable and skilled web developer, I highly recommend Shofiqul! I will definitely work with him again in the future.

seller_response.comment: Your feedback means a lot to me, many thanks!
